definitions: composed of parts or elements that are all of the same kind; not heterogeneous
of the same kind or nature; essentially alike
Mathematics: having a common property throughout
Mathematics: having all terms of the same degree

Mathematics: relating to a function of several variables that becomes multiplied by some power of a constant when each variable is multiplied by that constant: x2y3 is a homogeneous expression of degree 5
Mathematics: relating to a differential equation in which a linear combination of derivatives is set equal to zero.
